@js:let d=['全部','校园','搞笑','后宫','生活','恋爱','霸总','热血','科幻','古风','真人','悬疑','穿越','耽美','恐怖','修真','女主','神幻'];d=d.map(i=>{i={title:i,url:'booklist?page={{page}}&cate='+encodeURI(i)+'&area=-1&end=-1',style:{layout_flexGrow:2,layout_flexBasisPercent:3},};return i});JSON.stringify(d);

@js:let t=['全部','热血','冒险','科幻','霸总','玄幻','校园','修真','搞笑','穿越','后宫','悬疑','恐怖','战争','动作','同人','竞技','励志','架空','灵异','古风','生活','真人','都市','武侠','格斗','剧情','其它','总裁','奇幻','韩漫','纯爱','日常','少年','大女主','异能'],u=['index.php/category','index.php/category/tags/6','index.php/category/tags/7','index.php/category/tags/8','index.php/category/tags/9','index.php/category/tags/10','index.php/category/tags/11','index.php/category/tags/12','index.php/category/tags/13','index.php/category/tags/14','index.php/category/tags/15','index.php/category/tags/18','index.php/category/tags/19','index.php/category/tags/20','index.php/category/tags/21','index.php/category/tags/22','index.php/category/tags/23','index.php/category/tags/24','index.php/category/tags/25','index.php/category/tags/26','index.php/category/tags/28','index.php/category/tags/29','index.php/category/tags/30','index.php/category/tags/31','index.php/category/tags/50','index.php/category/tags/51','index.php/category/tags/294','index.php/category/tags/295','index.php/category/tags/296','index.php/category/tags/297','index.php/category/tags/298','index.php/category/tags/299','index.php/category/tags/300','index.php/category/tags/301','index.php/category/tags/302','index.php/category/tags/303'];JSON.stringify(t.map((e,i)=>{return {title:e,url:u[i]+'/page/{{page}}',style:{layout_flexGrow:2,layout_flexBasisPercent:3},};}));
